app.title: Ngx2Excel - JSON & Excel Converter
app.subtitle: Convert your files easily
app.desription: Ngx2Excel is an Angular application that allows you to convert files between Excel (XLSX/CSV) and JSON through a simple and responsive web interface. The project includes two main features: extracting data from Excel files to JSON, and generating Excel files from JSON, with support for dragâ€‘andâ€‘drop and output format options.

convertJsonToExcel.title: Merge JSON files to Excel/CSV
convertJsonToExcel.description: Select multiple JSON translation files (i18n) to merge them into a single Excel or CSV table.
